commit.message:
Online agent and HSMM (#17)

* Training exec.

* Changing implementation of approximate inference.

* Creating new executable for data generation, training and evaluation.

* Refactoring executables and ASIST makefile.

* Refactoring online estimation.

* Parameterizing message topics to subscribe and publish to

* Finishing refactoring online estimation.

* Creating an asist directory to put json configuration files associated to the several studies under the ASIST program.

* Fixing math with timer dependent on multinodes.

* Merging dockerization and preparing system for hackathon.

* Refactoring makefiles and automating file transfering to and from laplace.

* Checking messages by header and msg instead of topic and fixing some bugs in the makefiles.

* Update makefile to save laplace files in correct directory

* Update Dockerfile and create docker compose file

* Creating asist folder

* Fixing bug with json

* Updating docker compose to include parameters for start_agent

* Publishing messages individually

* Allowing less than 3 players

* Writing estimates in a single message and printing when triage event is detected to test.

* Changing step size to 1 second in the doker settings.

* Adding multiplayer option in the start_agent in the docker file.

* Include multiplayer converter in online agent.

* Printing some stuff to debug

* Making conversion compatible with old version.

* Printing role to the terminal to debug

* Detecting role selection prior to mission start.

* Do not fill observations after the mission is finished.

* Dynamic number of players.

* Trying to fix segmentation fault

* Stop printing to terminal. Finishing fixing bugs for the hackathon.

* Fixing bugs with the semi-markov model and finishing online estimation.

* Removing debug code from evaluation and training programs.

Co-authored-by: Paulo Soares <paulosoares@SBS-7186.local>
Co-authored-by: Shreeya Jain <shreeyaajain@gmail.com>
